alert.note: Alert for Lower St. Martin; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:46PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Iberia, north central St. Mary and southeastern St. Martin Parishes through 315 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Charenton, or 10 miles northeast of Franklin, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Baldwin and Charenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lower St. Martin; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Mary
